item.title: Jeremy add a quote by James Russell Lowell in "The Dante Club"
item.description: "Till America has learned to love literature not as an amusement, not as mere doggerel to memorize in a college room, but for its humanizing and ennobling energy...she will not have succeeded in that high sense which alone makes a nation out of a people. That which raises it from a dead name to a living power." -- James Russell Lowell in "The Dante Club"

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Harold Bloom
item.description: "Reading well is one of the great pleasures that solitude can afford you." -- Harold Bloom

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Harold Bloom
item.description: "Real reading is a lonely activity." -- Harold Bloom

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You buy furniture. You tell yourself, this is the last sofa I will ever need in my life. Buy the sofa, then for a couple years you're satisfied that no matter what goes wrong, at least you've got your sofa issue handled. Then the right set of dishes. Then the perfect bed. The drapes. The rug. Then you're trapped in your lovely nest, and the things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "No one asks you to throw Mozart out of the window. Keep Mozart. Cherish him. Keep Moses too, and Buddha and Lao Tzu and Christ. Keep them in your heart. But make room for the others, the coming ones, the ones who are already scratching on the window-panes." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Daniel Quinn
item.description: "Our lifestyle is evolutionarily unstable--and is therefore in the process of eliminating itself in the perfectly ordinary way." -- Daniel Quinn

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Daniel Quinn
item.description: "The world must live. We are only one species among billions. The gods don't love us any more than they love spiders or bears or whales or water lilies." -- Daniel Quinn

item.title: Jeremy add a quote by Daniel Quinn
item.description: "There is no one right way to live." -- Daniel Quinn
